backend/main.mo: Defines the main Motoko actor with access control, registry mixin, maps for companies, reviews, profiles, official requests/responses, rating data, and subscription-related types.
feature_evidence.json: Describes a feature update requiring relative URLs in frontend/index.html metadata and lists related components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files detailing their purpose and recent functional updates.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting metadata, favicon, canonical URL, Open Graph tags, DNS prefetching, and bootstrapping the frontend app.

frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with variables, theming, typography, utilities, scrollbars, and animations.

frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page with hero section, manifesto content, and navigation to employers page.
